Body: Description: Security scan is detecting that port 81 http is open on the server even though Access Analyzer is using https.
Steps to Reproduce Updated: Customer running security scan that detects port 81 is open on HTTP even though the product has been moved to port 481 HTTPS.

What We've Learned Updated: IIS still had port 81 opened even though we are using port 481 HTTPS.
Disabled port 81 in IIS and awaiting security scan to confirm issue is resolved.
Next Steps Updated: Awaiting customer security scan

What We've Learned Updated: --------
05/12/2025
--------
Customer confirmed that the scan came back ok after the last run, but they want to run one more scan on the 14th to double check.

IIS still had port 81 opened even though we are using port 481 HTTPS.
Disabled port 81 in IIS and awaiting security scan to confirm issue is resolved.
